name: Omen (D)
customPrimary: Continuously fires an EMP arc that deals %s energy damage and %s EMP damage every %s seconds at a random target within %s su. Not modified by hullmods.
customAncillary: Has a chance to hit itself when no target is in range.

name: Kite (D)
customPrimary: Provides a %s top speed and maneuverability boost to the opposite direction the weapon is facing.
customAncillary: The weapon turns automatically. Affected by turn rate bonuses.

name: Reaper (D)
customPrimary: Fires on impact. Cannot be disabled.

name: Hound (D)
tags: he15, SR, lowtech_bp, midline_bp, merc, ind
customPrimary: The system is independant of the host ship. Not affected by stat modifiers.

name: Warden (D)
tags: he15, SR, lowtech_bp, midline_bp, merc, ind
customPrimary: The system is independant of the host ship. Not affected by stat modifiers.

name: Mudskipper Mk.II (D)
customPrimary: The system is independant of the host ship. Not affected by stat modifiers.

name: Sarissa (D)
customPrimary: The system is independant of the host ship. Not affected by stat modifiers.

name: Retribution (D)
customPrimary: Pushes all ships within a 300 su range.

name: Ox (D)
customPrimary: Grabs the nearest ship within %s su automatically. Builds %s flux/s depending on the mass of the host and the target ship.
customAncillary: Launches captured ship at great speed. Generates %s hard flux depending on the mass of the host and the target ship. Weapon is temporarily disabled after fire.

name: Frigate Platform
customPrimary: Lands a frigate within %s su to this platform.
customAncillary: When the weapon is fired, force all weapons on the frigate to force fire.

name: Fighter Platform
customPrimary: Lands a fighter within %s su to this platform.
customAncillary: When the weapon is fired, force all weapons on the fighter to force fire.
